title: Create car shop app with loading screen and product gallery

requirements.summary: Display a loading screen when the app first launches before showing the main content
acceptanceCriteria: Loading screen appears immediately on app launch
Loading screen transitions to main content after a brief delay
Loading animation or indicator is visible during the loading phase

file_operations.description: Create a loading screen component with a spinner or animation and automotive-themed styling that displays briefly before transitioning to main content
Add loading state management and conditional rendering to show LoadingScreen component on initial mount, then transition to main gallery content after a brief delay

requirements.summary: Create a photo gallery displaying images of cars and car engines on the main screen
acceptanceCriteria: Images are clearly visible and properly formatted
Gallery layout is organized and easy to navigate

file_operations.description: Create a gallery component that displays car and engine photos in a grid layout. Wire in the generated images from frontend/public/assets/generated/car-1.dim_800x600.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/engine-1.dim_800x600.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/car-2.dim_800x600.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/engine-2.dim_800x600.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/car-3.dim_800x600.png, and frontend/public/assets/generated/engine-3.dim_800x600.png as static assets with proper image optimization and responsive layout
Import and render the CarGallery component as the main content view after the loading screen completes

requirements.summary: Display purchase information with 'Buy' text and price below each car photo in the gallery
acceptanceCriteria: Each car listing shows 'Buy' text below the photo
Price is displayed below each car photo
Purchase information is clearly readable and positioned at the bottom of each item

file_operations.description: Create a card component for individual car listings that displays the car image at the top with 'Buy' text and price information positioned below the image in a clear, readable format using Shadcn Card component
Update the gallery to use CarCard components for each car listing, passing image paths and mock price data to each card

requirements.summary: Apply a cohesive automotive showroom design theme with premium styling, clean layout, and professional presentation suitable for a car dealership
acceptanceCriteria: Visual theme reflects automotive industry aesthetics
Typography and colors create a premium, professional appearance
Layout emphasizes product photography and clear pricing information
Design remains consistent across loading screen and gallery views

file_operations.description: Add custom CSS variables and global styles for automotive showroom theme including premium color palette (dark grays, metallics, accent colors), typography settings for professional presentation, and consistent spacing rules
Extend Tailwind configuration with custom theme colors for automotive showroom aesthetic, premium font families, and spacing scales that support clean product-focused layouts
Apply automotive showroom theme styling to the loading screen component ensuring visual consistency with the main gallery view
Apply premium automotive showroom styling to the gallery layout emphasizing clean presentation and product photography
Apply premium automotive styling to card components with professional typography, clear price display, and polished visual treatment
